title: Responsive Portfolio Website
description: A responsive website to showcase my projects and resume. Designed with modern CSS techniques and JavaScript interactivity.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard built using D3.js that visualizes data trends over time.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with a robust back-end API, payment integration, and a sleek front-end design.

title: Mobile Game App
description: A fun and engaging mobile game built with Unity and C#. Features include in-app purchases and social sharing.

title: Machine Learning Model Deployment
description: Deployed a machine learning model using Flask and Docker, providing real-time predictions and data insights.

title: Social Media Analytics Tool
description: A tool that analyzes social media trends and sentiments, built with Node.js and React.

title: Blog Platform CMS
description: Developed a content management system (CMS) for blogging with features for post scheduling, SEO, and custom theming.

title: Weather Forecasting App
description: A sleek, user-friendly weather forecasting app that integrates real-time data from external APIs.

title: Interactive Learning Module
description: An interactive online course module with quizzes, tutorials, and animations built with HTML5 and JavaScript.

title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A personal budgeting and finance tracking tool that visualizes spending habits and custom reports.

title: Virtual Reality Experience
description: Developed a VR application that immerses users in a simulated environment, built with A-Frame and WebVR.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application with support for multimedia messages and cross-platform notifications.
